## CryptoTokenGenerator.generateBase64UrlToken() method

Generates a cryptographically secure random token in Base64 URL-safe format.

**Signature:**

```typescript
generateBase64UrlToken(byteLength: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

byteLength


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The number of random bytes to generate (before encoding)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

A Base64 URL-safe encoded string representing the random bytes

## Example


```typescript
const token = generator.generateBase64UrlToken(16); // URL-safe base64 string
```
